Reviews.Author: Fake name real review

Then you'll see me easily and quickly navigate the menu to go back to midnight of the night before and show the nightvision capabilities. The camera(3) I zoom in on shows a dark corner that would appear completely black to people looking at it. The nightvision capability of this system is awesome. Camera 2 shows a car in the street, that area has no light around it and you can still clearly see the car and surrounding area.All in all I'm happy with my purchase. I did a LOT of research before making this purchase and it payed off. I'd definitely recommend this product to a friend.UPDATE::: The system is working great still with the exception of one camera. The night vision is blurry on one camera and there is obviously something wrong with that specific camera since the problem followed the camera to the four mount points. I contacted SVAT customer service and they told me to send the camera back. I did and two months later I received an email from them saying the camera works fine and they're sending back the original. I received the original back and it still has the problem. They must not have read what I wrote was the actual problem. I'm disappointed with their customer service this time and I guess I'll just buy another camera to replace the broken one.UPDATE 2::: I uploaded another video real fast to show the system again. The file was too large so I used a free file converter to change the format to make the file smaller. I guess they watermark the video and limit it to 3 minutes. Not a big deal cause it was only 3:09 so the entire video is essentially there. Sorry for the watermark though.

Reviews.Title: 2+ Years and Going Strong
Reviews.Author: G. Woods "gregw9"
Reviews.Content: I installed the slightly earlier version (no smart phone access) of this system in our 2nd home in December of 2008.  It seems that many people post reviews soon after purchasing a product or very soon after something goes wrong with the item or the service. I thought it might be good to post a review from a long time user.I had some trouble with system set-up (It ended up being a problem with my computer). And, I had to replace one camera about a year ago.  The customer service was responsive and helpful. We view the cameras daily from our home 900 miles away, and we've used them to resolve a couple of false alarms with our ADT system. The cameras have been operating outdoors in TN for over 2 years in temps between 5 and 100 degrees in rain, snow, sleet etc.  I have recommended this system to many people and will continue to do so.Bottom line: The system has performed almost flawlessly and the customer service is very good.

Reviews.Title: Looks better online
Reviews.Author: jstan
Reviews.Content: After doing some research on these cameras, It seemed these cameras were the best for the price. Real happy with the plug and play setup, very easy to set up. The only thing I am not happy with is the quality of the video. The pics online showed a crisp clear image, these images are very grainy and jumpy. Hard to see faces or licence plate #'s, night vision works, but amplifies low light to the point it blurs out the rest of the image, but for the price not a bad setup. all in all good quality for the price... i would have spent more for a better picture.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Swaf
Reviews.Content: After reading all the favorable reviews I was sold on buying this product. Unfortunately it does not work very well and I cannot connect to my I-phone or the internet. The color of green tree's are white, the customer service agent says this is normal and no color adjustment can be made. She also said the DVR needs to be within 15-20 feet of the internet feed which is not noted anywhere. After spending over 60 minutes waiting on the phone for an available agent I finally sent an e-mail as they suggested. After 3 days I finally received a very brief e-mail which did not answer my questions. A few days later I was finally able to talk with an agent. She connected to my laptop and made some changes and said I was set. Well, like I said - no I-phone and no internet connection to the system. I have sent 4 emails over the last 7 days but still have not heard anything back. I am going to send this back and find a different company that has better customer service and better products.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good, but wait, there's more
Reviews.Author: Roger F.
Reviews.Content: I received my SVAT 4 channel/4 camera DVR security system a couple of days ago and after a rather lengthy installation (my own fault, as I am a neat freak), the system booted up just fine.  I have not had the time to go through all the set-up and recording options, but they seem pretty straight forward.  Basically, once you plug in the cameras and power up the DVR, the system is recording.  The definition of the system is about what I expected....about standard definition TV quality.  (Remember what that is?  Before High Def.)  If you want high def, you will spend A LOT OF MONEY.My biggest complaint is the cheesy little camera mounting brackets.  None of the 4 included in the box are very stable (the ball joint for the camera cannot really be torqued into stability.  If you do try to tighten them too much, the plastic handle just spins on the threaded lock screw.  One of the mounts was totally inoperable -- the head assembly just flops around, so it is worthless.  I contacted SVAT and they are apparently sending a replacement mount.I was so disappointed with the mounting situation, that I have already ordered 4 after-market mounts that received pretty good reviews.  You might want to check out VideoSecu 4 Wall Ceiling Mounts for Security Video Cameras 2-6 inch Adjustable Pan Tilt Camera Mounting Bracket 1S8  I haven't received them yet, but at least they are alleged to be steel, instead of the SVAT pot metal mounts.UPDATE (6/7/2012):  After looking at additional video monitoring systems, I have relegated this system to backup duty due to lack of resolution (420 line) and (honestly) crappy night vision lighting.  SVAT actually has the huevos to call the cameras "hi def".  I found much better products from Q-See, with cameras of 600 line resolution and night vision capabilities to put this system to shame.  Check Costco.com.

Reviews.Title: NOT High Resolution!
Reviews.Author: Florida Girl "Florida Girl"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this video camera system based on the good reviews it received.  However, once we received it we were deeply disappointed with the video quality both day and night.The images were fuzzy and pixellated.  Facial recognition poor.  Color was just OK.  We even wired one of these cameras to our old (very basic) video unit to compare quality with our older cameras.  We discovered that our old cameras had better resolution than these new "Hi-Resolution" cameras.  We are returning this item.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for....
Reviews.Author: G. Stern
Reviews.Content: only one 1 out of the 4 cameras works well enough to actually see clearly. what a disappointment this purchase was. the only one positive is that the DVR is easy to operate. eventually i will need to buy better cameras for this system. its probably worth the extra money to purchase a better quality product.

Reviews.Title: Deltonrab
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Rabidou
Reviews.Content: I $ this SVAT cam in door and outside in the winter time.This SVAT 4ch with smart phone is the best Security System's I have ever used.It was boxed a-ok it is a easy install,even a child of age 12-15 can set up. The Hi-Res cams are clear The hard drive is easy to workwith so I have no Con's to say about this unit, For the money it is a must due to the crime rate soring, When my home was inspected the insurance writer took a photo of this unit and even got a better discount. Be advised some insurance Co's do not give this extra as I did. And most of all I had One cam after 7 mo,of use that had a fault, I returned it back Via White hand glove, Via first class mail (Insured) and in less then 2 weeks my new replacement arrived, Keep up the good work ( SVAT ) and Amazon staff sales and shiping.Respectfully Submitted,Dennis P.Rabidou

Reviews.Title: Save your money horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: oneor12002
Reviews.Content: First off, I usually don't like writing bad about any companies but this particular one left a bad taste in my mouth and I felt like I should warn others in the hopes that they won't experience the same fate....Great product if you're only looking to get full functionality from it for the first 8-12 months.....Then the cameras imager starts to go, black screen or loses connection randomly. If I had to do it over again I would have paid a little bit more for a better build quality. STAY AWAY FROM SVAT/Defender products. Customer support is terrible, one of the worst companies I've dealt with. Yes my product was out of warranty by 6 months however I would hope to get more than a years use out of a product before its components all start failing.Save your money, look elsewhere....

Reviews.Title: Nice setup but camera quality lags.
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Setting up this product was a snap...but I decided to take the installation a bit further and utilize my Arc welder to make a thick security box for the DVR (also made a wood box to put around it).  So far I have not had any overheating issues and I believe the reason for this is twofold:1) I live in Upper Michigan and we have cooler temperatures up here even in the summertime.2) The DVR is kept in the basement where it is cooler.  (For those of you who think about breaking in you'd better bring some C4 and blasting caps 'cause that box is indestructible).The camera quality is decent but I, as others stated, should have spent a bit more for better quality.  Bear in mind however, that if you need to bring in the DVR to the cops to analyze suspicious activity then the quality does not matter too much.  The police have their own tools to get what they need off the DVR in higher quality than what you would expect. You might want to consider buying a supplement PTZ camera to supplement the 4 cameras that come with the system.  Believe me, you WILL find use for another camera.  I also recommend buying a trail camera to hide (if you live in the country like I do) to watch your road...just in case your system fails you or the bad guys steal it.  My final recommendation is buying a battery backup just in case you are dealing with professional criminals and they cut the power, which would render your camera system useless.  I know this seems a bit excessive but hey, if you have belongings to protect they take every precautionary measure to secure them!  My Platoon motto in the Army was simple, "Trust nobody!"Ps: don't forget to post signs identifying the fact that you own and use a camera system.  Sometimes this is as much of a deterrent than the actual camera itself.I hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Very happy so far - a few tweaks and it'd be perfect!
Reviews.Author: mommyania
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from B&H; as they had the best price at the time (Nov 2011).  Shipping was unbelievably fast.  Connecting everything to the DVR / power supply was actually quite simple and doesn't require advanced knowledge or instructions at all.  The hardest part was running the individual cables through the wall.  Images are pretty clear, and the night vision only goes out about 15 feet.I rated this a 4 star though for a few reasons:a) I bought this because based on reviews I read, the customer support was apparently amongst the best available. They CLAIM 24/7 support, but a live person is only available during normal business hours.  Additionally, when calling during normal hours, you can only remain in the queue for 15 minutes, after which it goes to a voicemail where you have no clue if you'll ever get a call back.  So far, I haven't.b) The one thing I didn't like about running the cables was the size of the plug itself.  The wiring is super thin, which is nice because that means you only need a super thin hole in your wall to run it through.  But the plug itself requires you to drill a much bigger hole (it's about the size of the old Keyboard / mouse plugs that go into the back of your computer). So just to get the plug through the wall, I had to drill very large holesc) Setting up the networking wasn't terribly painful...but it wasn't very easy either...and still isn't working 100%.  The tutorials provided are helpful for the basics, but not for troubleshooting.  I'm running Win7/IE9 and can not see the cameras using Internet browser, despite all my firewalls being off and all netowork settings configured exactly to spec.  Firefox is out of the question since the system requires ActiveX. I would suggest using the NetViewer app provided on the installation CD for use on your home computers.  That seems to have given me an alternative solution to the problem.d) I have an IPOD touch and a Android Galaxy 10.1 Tablet.  The CD provides an app for the Tablet that seems to work well.  It does not provide an app for the Ipod / Iphone though.  The folder is there, but it has nothing in it.  You have to go the IPOD APP store yourself and install "ASEE"...which is listed no where in any of the instructions.  Once installed, you can view your cameras live on the Ipod.All in all, I am very satisfied with the system and would recommend it.  These are the things that frustrated me personally, so hopefully they can help you make an educated decision.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective security with limited reliability
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: System was easy to set up and operate. Very good daytime picture but limited at night. No way to reccognize faces once it gets dark outside. After about one month of use, I noticed some issues. For instance,on several occasions, when viewing recordings in 4 camera simultaneous mode, it would display all views and in about 5 seconds, it would switch to camera 1 view only. I needed to reboot the system several times to correct this. In one instance, the time stamp recordings of night time showed that it was between 12 AM and 5 AM but were showing broad daylight. For the price, it's OK but don't bet the farm on it or you will be dissapointed. For me it works. In fact, I had been wondering why the netting over my backyard pond was destroyed on three occaisions over the course of a week. When I reviewed the recordings on my SVAT system, I found myself watching my neighbors dog splashing around in the pond, thereby tearing the netting. The system allowed me to figure out where the dog was getting into my yard and I was able to fix a small gap in my stockade fence.One tip: The bugs are attracted to the infra red light at night which results in spiders taking up residence near the camera. Be ready to clean the webs away pretty often.

Reviews.Title: Does not work externally
Reviews.Author: C. Nagel
Reviews.Content: Installed over 2.5 years ago. Worked fine for the first month. Hard to set up port forwarding, even with assistance from tech support. After the first month, the port forwarding never worked again. Spent countless hours on hold with tech support. Average wait time is about 45 minutes before you speak with an actual rep. I have done everything that the rep has told me to do. I have followed every step in the manual and watched each video tutorial numerous times. All with the same results...no external viewing. What good is a DVR system if you can't view the footage?

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Truger
Reviews.Content: Everything works perfectly the best parts of it are:4 Night vision cameras (when theirs light the video is in color when its dark out the video is band white)1 usb laser mouse for controlling the camera system easily. (not your average cheap ball mouse)The camera's DVR which can record up to a month of video and has a usb port to allow for an external hard drive to be connected for additional space as the saying goes your defiantly getting for what you pay for with this camera set which also allows you to connect and view he camera from your mobile phone or desktop computer from anywhere theirs internet access or free Wifi (if you have a ipod touch like i do) all four camera are powered by a single ac adapter which splits the power into four individual cables. The camera's connect do a composite (the yellow, red, white cables) to i think it was a BCX adapter which is great because the camera's aren't bound to the security DVR so if you wanna place a camera on a tv or you wanna connect a different video source to the security console you can.

Reviews.Title: Poor service!
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: New unit.. doesn't work with the mouse and doesn't work pushing any of the function keys on unit. Also camera image is shaded Magenta..Bad service..rfs

Reviews.Title: Camera resolution is a joke.
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: I'll keep this short. I love all the features of this system, the hard drive space, the internet connectivity, the style, etc.But one thing can not be forgiven.  These supposedly 'high resolution' cameras are a blatant lie. I've been using this system for a while now and I swear the WEBCAM on my cheap netbook produces clearer, crisper video than this. Hell, my CELLPHONE puts these cameras to shame. Don't believe the hype, these cams can't be any more than 320x240 video.  It's grainy and very blurry, I have a cam mounted about 20ft from the alley and I can't read license plates on passing cars. That's how bad it is.If I could replace all the cams with real hd cameras I would be in heaven because everything else about this system is great.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: J. T. Birkhahn
Reviews.Content: The instructions were easy to follow, and connecting the equipment wasn't too hard.  From the start, I found that one of the four cameras did not work at all.  The other cameras worked and the resolution was about what I expected for the price.  The cameras had issues with brightness and contrast as people or objects moved closer to the cameras.  I decided to return the one bad camera to the manufacturer and handle replacement that way.  I wished that I would have waited another day, because the next day, the DVR quit working and would not even power on.  I only used the DVR two weeks and that's all I got out of it.  If the camera ever comes back to me, I plan to return everything back to Amazon.  They say "You get what you pay for", but I'm pretty sure that I didn't even get that!  Good luck with this manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: CV502
Reviews.Author: Dale R. Smith
Reviews.Content: Initial set-up was easy an straight foward.  Picture quality is poor.  I can not read a car tag 20' away.  Motion detection recording is not working.  Night view is completely a wash.  Completely black and unable to see a thing.  I sent messages to SVAT for questions and it takes about 3 days to get an answer.  Have to read thru the manual completely to figure out the program and controls.  Not very user friendly.  Very confusing.  They spend half the manual jumping in and out of a camera system that is not even part of the system. Not worth the money even at $250.  I just bought a replacement set from a diferent company.

Reviews.Title: Turned out to be disappointing
Reviews.Author: DeejN
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with this system. Pictures are not "crystal clear", but very much satisfactory.  I would never have expected perfection with such a low price.  Husband has a system at work, so we knew what to expect as far as the quality.  I feel that the quality of the cameras are as good as or better than at my husband's office and they paid about three times the amount that we did.  Theirs was a different brand. We are very happy with the system.  We have had it a few months now and have decided that we should have purchased an 8-camera system.  Four cameras would be more suitable for a smaller property.12/11/2012: UPDATE: Well, it has been a year and a half since we purchased this system.  THREE OF THE FOUR CAMERAS NO LONGER WORK.  Pretty disappointing that they have not lasted that long.  The ones at my husband's office are still going strong.  I guess that is why they paid three times as much for their system.  Oh well...

Reviews.Title: SVAT CV502-4CH-002
Reviews.Author: Defendless female
Reviews.Content: As I always do, I did a lot of research before selecting.  I feel duped not by the product company, but by Amazon, because I was looking for a wireless for quick installation and each time I entered "Outdoors Wireless Cameras System" on Amazon, this product came up.  Since I'm not savy, when I received it I was given a $20 per camera by my installer over the phone, but when he made the trip to my home & found out it wasn't wireless I ended up having to pay $50 per camera (his avertized rate for non-wireless), i.e. $200, plus more for extra cables, etc..  I would have loved to give a 5 stars rating, but another matter happened while purchasing: I didn't know "weather-resistant" doesn't include waterproof and that the cameras need to be out of direct sun.  The pictures are AMAZINGLY clear, even in the dark of the night.  I would highly recommend to my friends if like me they had to protect their property 24/7 like I have to, against a dangerous next-door neighbor!  I had to call on Labor Day as mouse/remote/dvr were still blank since I installed cameras and was very nicely helped by a female rep in Canada who helped me "unlock" everything in no time (not in manual, so I had to call).  I don't have time to "play" with all features but this seems to be a very good company.

Reviews.Title: Nice and Easy system setup
Reviews.Author: B_Ranch
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a system that will give you a clear picture of license plates you will want to pay a little more. This is great for our application. Easy setup and decent picture quality for the price. I had a shipping issue. Ordered two systems and they only shipped one. After contacting the seller the second unit was shipped about a week later.

Reviews.Title: not to bad
Reviews.Author: Theodore Douglas
Reviews.Content: worked great, but not clear enough to identify person breaking in, which is what the police need. Did work well when the weather was bad.

Reviews.Title: one broken camera
Reviews.Author: Steven Suehiro
Reviews.Content: same as the guy before me one of my cameras is broken. No matter what i do (i even changed all 3 of my cameras to the position the broken one is and all 3 worked fine) the camera stays in night vision. It seems to me that you will only get 3 good cameras and one bad one.  im not goin to send it back because they will prob tell me that it works fine... but it doesentand im not going to waste my time and money to go though that. its stays in night vision even when i put a flashlight up to it. The tec service for svat it 5 star though. they set up mobile viewing by takking over my comp and setting everything up for me (verizon thunderbolt) but if you want to b dissipointed by one of the cameras go ahead and buy this system, i just reccomend buy an extra camera to replace the bad one that you WILL recieve... But mobile viewing is awsome you can be at work or on vacation and view all of youre cameras with a 1.5 sec delay.. does not skip a beat and its not like the other cameras that skip around, its a steady picture. If it wasent for the broken camera this would of been a 5 star review.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Mr. Orencio Medina Jr. "Orencio"
Reviews.Content: The quality is grainy and I am never able to get support on the phone. I am also not able to view it on my computer monitor. I need to purchase another monitor to see the camera views and up to now I have not been able to figure out how to play back what has been recorded. If I could purchase again, I would purchase quality wireless cameras.

Reviews.Title: Cameras are junk
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: One of the camera's wires broke while pulling it through the hole going in the house. Another camera's adjusting screw broke when trying to tighten back down after adjusting the camera. It hadn't even started to tighten when it broke. I had to buy 4 new cameras to replace the two that broke.

Reviews.Title: They work but they suck
Reviews.Author: N. Broadhurst "Book reader"
Reviews.Content: The web interface is the easist part. Configuring it from a monitor is terrible becuase there is no keyboard. The resoultion isn't the greatest. some stole my rims and I got it on camera but the resolution could not make out any faces. The phone app doesn't work or the ipad app.

Reviews.Title: An ok system
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: Easy to install. Only set back is I can't see the cameras online like they say you can. Even the customer support was no help in resolving the issue. If it wasn't that the cameras were already installed I would have returned them.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Joloveshorses
Reviews.Content: My son wanted this to check out his surroundings.  He is disabled and wanted to have a look at who was coming to the door. It does a great job.  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: sparky7777
Reviews.Content: I have had the system up & running now for a little over a week & I am very pleased with my purchase. It's so nice to be able to check in via my Android also.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: Hugh A
Reviews.Content: This system is perfect to monitor small areas such as driveways, parking spots, entrances, exits etc. To cover more areas the 8 camera system is the way to go. To be effective, for example, you need one camera that captures activity in your driveway and leads to your front door and another camera to monitor activity at your front door. So quickly your use of 4 cameras is quickly spent.  This is an easy system to install and the instructions are easy to understand.  You can monitor the system over your smart phone which is nice when you are away.  Since installing this system we have already captured video of an event that was used as evidence in a pending case.Pros: Able to watch live action on TV or smart phone.Cons: Should have bought 8 camera setup.

Reviews.Title: SVAT VIDEO SYSTEM
Reviews.Author: EASY INSTALL
Reviews.Content: This was a very easy system to setup.  The instructions were very clear and user friendly.  I have had some dealings with other video systems that I'm involved with at work and compared to them I highly recommend this system to anyone who wants a low cost, high tech, easy to understand setup.  It provides a good resolution and has all the bells and whistles that you want.  It's provides an excellent home security system and gives you the peace of mind that you home and family are being monitored.I would say the biggest obsticale I had with the installation was running the wiring.  I wanted full coverage from all sides of my house and running the cables was a challenge.  But if you take the time to plan and think out your installation before hand it makes the job much easier.Great product!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Netengine
Reviews.Content: These people saying this is not hi-res or the IR sucks have not done their homework. I compared this to several other $300 systems and am completely satisfied with my decision. I bought an IR led light as a companion for the cameras that needed more light at night. A great accessory for under $50.The daytime pictures are excellent quality. Of course, you are not going to be framing pictures of grandma that you captured from your security system. People are too picky..."IT IS NOT HI-RES" ... go spend 10K then. DA... this thing is great and you get what is advertised.Oh yeah, spend a $100 on a decent desktop UPS. It will run for near an hour with the power out.

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: D Clark
Reviews.Content: Pros:1.  Inexpensive and simple to physically install.2.  Lots of video storage capability.Cons:1.  Camera mounting/adjustment brackets are cheap and difficult to tighten so camera(s) won't move in the wind.2.  One camera is DOA after about a month.  More to follow... just starting the RMA process.  Camera does appear to be solidly manufactured, i.e. they don't have a cheap feel to them.3.  Replacement cable (part # CVW61) is no longer sold/available.  I accidently damaged a cable during installation, which I am willing to pay for since I damaged it.  I was able to repair the cable.4.  Installation of the browser interface was difficult, and the whole interface seems just a little clunky.Summary, three stars, it's what I was looking for price-wise, camera resolution is ok.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Home security cameras
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I definitely recommend this item.  The cameras were easy to install.  It records for up to 2 weeks.  You can watch up to all 4 cameras live on the TV or recorded footage.  It gives me peace of mind knowing I can long onto my computer at work and see if there is anything suspicious going on at my house.  They have night vision as well.  The only thing I don't like is that I cannot watch the cameras or footage on multiple tvs.  I wish I could have it on my downstairs tv and in my bedroom if I hear a noise.  But definitely a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Contains everything you need.
Reviews.Author: KS Review "KS Review"
Reviews.Content: These security products aren't cheap so I was worried whether or not I would get my money's worth and I have to say that I am very satisfied. It came with everything needed for a quick install and the DVR was very quick and responsive. The slight downside is that the interface of the recorded video search is not as polished as I would like, but it's a minor problem that wouldn't affect most people.I can't speak on the durability of this product yet, but the camera looks durable enough. The dvr produces some heat (enough to notice) I am wondering if it'll last through hot summers as my dvr is placed where there is no A/C. But from what I can see so far, I don't think it'll be a problem.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste time or money... look elsewhere (try Panasonic or mainstream company)
Reviews.Author: Corey Sherman "TRiumph Garage"
Reviews.Content: After replacing two DVRs, several camera, wires, now four (4) ac adapters have failed. AT every turn a problem. Days until customer services get back to you; then they sell you something else. the latest... $20 per ac adapter (from China, costs $3) plus $10 shipping. That's $70 for 3 adapters... Amazon can't give these units away at $250, and they have the nerve to ask for $70, especially after I shelled out nearly $800.Don't walk, run away. I have two Panasonic cameras installed, and they have never been off online in seven years! In the three years I've had SVAT, nothing but problems. The resolution is low, the lux is not as stated, the software is difficult to transverse.A complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Home monitoring unit
Reviews.Author: Valntynes
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this unit!!!! It was so simple to install that I was able to do it myself. This unit makes me feel safe and secure in my home and while I  away from home.  While I am away from home I can go online and view my cameras anytime and make sure everything is good. The DVR records so I have a record of what's happened just in case.The hardest part was figuring out you need a special outgoing connection with your wifi internet company but once that was done, easy peasy!4 cameras give me plenty of coverage of my house and property. I have this system as well as a monitored indoor home alarm. I feel safe!

Reviews.Title: Good Product but Confusing
Reviews.Author: Franklin B. Hanshaw
Reviews.Content: I really like having the cameras and they give great video but I having a difficult time trying to use all its features. I have requested a manual from SVAT and maybe that will solve my problems.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Ryan Cullen
Reviews.Content: As a low-priority security system this setup is a great buy. If all you need to do is see people sniffing around the wrong places it's great. If you you need to be able to tell WHO that person is you should get a better camera. The DVR is decent and the features are nice. There is a noticeable lack of control in this system, you can only do what it wants you to do and nothing more. For casual use that's all you need. I chose this system for my small business but was concerned when I couldn't read the numbers on the height chart beside my front door from 10 feet away. We have replaced two of the cameras that come with this system with higher res cameras and use the cheaper cameras on low priority zones.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: r warn
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and navigate, literally plug and play. The resolution is pretty good, better than I expected and the night vision is solid as well.  I've had it up for a few months and the weather has not bothered it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent relation between price and quality
Reviews.Author: Oscar Muvdi
Reviews.Content: After doing some research on similar security systems, these cameras were rated as one of the best systems during 2012. Very easy to set up with the plug and play capabilities. I previously bought an identical system for my home, and I am so happy with it that I bought a second one for my parents house.

Reviews.Title: Very well worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Chico 305
Reviews.Content: These arrived sooner than I expected. They came with very clear and useful instructions. It took me very little time to set up. Very easy to set up and all the needed parts were there. I even have the ability to monitor my home from my android phone. I will definately recommend this to anyone who is looking for home security at a low price and good quality.

Reviews.Title: a must buy!!
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: Love the product. It was a easy setup. need to be a little computer bound to do the setup part in the computer/phone. this would of been a 5 star but customer service really didnt help me much. i wish they could of walk me thru some steps to cut down my setup time. overall its a must buy!

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Calvin Barron
Reviews.Content: So far the system appears to be worth the money spent. It is on the lower end of the $$$ side, so I wasn't Mission Impossible quality images that let me zoom into car tags. I plan on upgrading the cameras to get a better distant picture. They are all outside keeping watch. I haven't used the web app yet...but plan on it. Check out what the dog is doing.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: Great value and fast delivery. Box was sealed and no damage to components. Will set up in a couple of weeks at the house and will update this review after set-up.

Reviews.Title: up and running for a week...so far so good
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I picked up this camera system after repeated acts of vandalism to the house my family is renting.  Originally I thought I might be able to mount the cameras inside the windows, but this turned out to be foolish due to the glare from the infra red. The maintenance guys for the landlord did the install on the outside walls of the house, probably about 15 feet up.  They did an ok job, but it seems that there are only two planes of motion once the cameras are mounted on a vertical surface, so it was difficult to get the images aligned properly and upright.  This was most true of the camera mounted on the side of the house looking up a driveway.  It is possible that there was a trick to it, but since I wasn't doing the install I am not sure.  As for the image quality, it seems pretty good, but as other reviewers mentioned it is definitely not high definition.  During times of the day when the cameras get direct sunlight, the color can become a little strange.  The night vision works, but I am a little concerned about the image quality (It would be very frustrating to watch footage of a person in the act, but not be able to make out identifying features.)  Since there is so much pedestrian and vehicle traffic in front of the cameras it will be tricky to get the motion detection not to trip.  There is a feature that allows you to fine tune which areas in in the field of view trip the motion detection, as well as the overall sensitivity of motion detection, but that will take some work, and for now I am content to let the cameras record everything.  The 500gb HD is good for hundreds of hours of video - 3 of 4 cameras have been running for close to a week straight, and there are over 300gb remaining.  As for the networking and smartphone feature, all of the documentation is written with Windows users in mind.  We've got Macs, and I am not sure how that will work out, or even if it can.  Again, this will require some more work which I just haven't been able to put in.Overall, despite a few misgivings I am happy with the purchase.  If it works out and we are able to either catch or dissuade the craven jerk harassing us, I will be really pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good budget system
Reviews.Author: Nubicles
Reviews.Content: This is a good system for the price: four cameras and a DVR for under $350 is pretty amazing.  The picture and build quality could be better, but both are adequate.  The night vision is surprisingly good.  The most difficult part of the setup was running the wires through the house.The user interface didn't show up at first, but that was resolved quickly with a call to SVAT tech support.Setting up the web/smartphone interface was somewhat complicated, but I think that's unavoidable.  You're basically running a web server, and that requires getting an external IP address and configuring your router.  I used no-ip.com for DDNS since it's free (the one recommended in the manual now charges a fee).The quality of the smartphone app is also surprisingly good.  I was expecting still images every few seconds, but instead it's video at a few frames per second.  It's easy to use and responsive.-Brian

Reviews.Title: Nice Security Setup
Reviews.Author: Eliah Mountjoy
Reviews.Content: So, I just bought this and began setting it up.  It's pretty straight forward, and if your like me (setting this up at 2am) you'll be happy to know there's a 24hr support line, who helped me get to the finish line.  The quality of the cameras exceeded my expectations, and overall, this is an excellent buy and great bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Great System
Reviews.Author: hawk
Reviews.Content: I recieved the system fairly quickly, And it didn't take long to install. I was impressed with the funtions of the system. I like it a lot.Mark. H

Reviews.Title: svat cv502-4ch-002 security system
Reviews.Author: kjg
Reviews.Content: this security system is working out very well. I am happy with the product. It was very easy to set up and program. I am using it on an outside setting looking a little to far for the cameras clairity. so i would recommend using it for the recommended distances.thanks kevin

Reviews.Title: svatcv502
Reviews.Author: george
Reviews.Content: Great it is a good system checked and compaired with other units Its even better than they stated Good picture easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Good system
Reviews.Author: Brian Hofacre
Reviews.Content: Nice system with four indoor/outdoor cameras with night vision.  Wish the cameras had a little better resolution but you are not going to get a professional system for $350.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, great product!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This product is great for the price, the night vision works very well.  I strongly reccomend you configure the FRAMERATE manually to get the best quality for certain cameras so the motion is nice and smooth.  You may need someone technical to assist with the email alerts and networking configuration due to SMTP restrictions on some ISPs.PROS1. Excellent price and features2. IPHONE app works great (i am using WEYE not the suggested one)3. Night vision works great4. You can schedule the recording patterns and also configure email alerts for motion detection5. When it starts to get dark outside, the camera enhances the white balance to keep it looking like normal daylight for about an extra 30-60 minutes which is awsome6.  Easy installation and mounting options, helps for a simple DIY projectCONS1. I did have one of the cameras go bad after a couple days, this appears to be a random issue based on some other postings i read.  I will be reigstering the product online and sending the camera back for replacement2. The camera quality is great but not well enough to read a license plate in day mode3. Unable to make out the persons identity in night vision mode4.  Email alerts are annoying due to night vision constantly detecting motion even on low settingProduct was shipped quickly and well packaged.  I would definately suggest this item to a freind.

Reviews.Title: CV502-4CH-002
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I was looking for some cameras to be able to watch my kids in the yard and also be able to capture video for security. I had an old 2.4 GHz wireless camera system that I had purchased prior to purchasing the CV502 and found that the video quality was not good at all. I also found that being 2.4 GHz, it interfered with my Wi-Fi network causing slowdown.I did research and found that the CV502 was the best for the money. I've had this system for several months and have been very pleased with the functions and reliability that it provides. The night vision works very well, and the daytime colors are very good. I'm also able to view the cameras remotely when traveling whether it be from a PC or my iPad. I ended up buying an extra camera that I put on a switch but may later upgrade to in a camera system.To say the least, I'm very plesed with the CV502 System and with the suppoet that I received when setting it up.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Matthew S Wolfington
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and installation.  Doesn't seem to be anything comparable in the market. ShopTronics easy to deal with and held up their end of the sale. We bought two and used them in church nurseries.  Great for parents to know their children are watched personally and electronically.  Great for liability from an employer standpoint.Recommended!Matt

Reviews.Title: Great DVR with no audio
Reviews.Author: kel
Reviews.Content: Bought this set and all i can say is if you are looking for a DVR with remote viewing capabilities, this is it. Setup was relatively straightforward with the very detailed instructions given. Otherwise, there is also the customer service online chat available and they are a great help. Only downside was no audio came with the cameras for this model. However, for this price point, you would be really hard-pressed to find one with audio.

Reviews.Title: Amazing buy for the money
Reviews.Author: xxtommyxx
Reviews.Content: Installation was a breeze. The quality of the video is amazing. The search menu and options are easy to use and very helpful. Will buy another for a family member. Once installed there is no need to touch anything. The DVR records everything all the time. It just overwrites the old video and continues to record with the new.Thomas

Reviews.Title: Customer Service was Really Good!
Reviews.Author: Michael Davis
Reviews.Content: I did a little reasearch before getting the Svat system, and you couldn't beat the value-  It's actaully gone up $50 (now $350) since my purchase, but that's still pretty good-This system comes with the smartphone ap included on the CD (with a more inclusive user guide than the hard copy)-  The ap works better than one I paid $5 for-The video quality is pretty good, and the system does everything I need-  I had to call Svat for some technical support-  They're in the US, and the gentleman was very knowlegeable, and helpful-

Reviews.Title: Fantastic performance and easy to install
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: The unit was easy to install and configure for both local and remote access. We can access live video from our Android phones very easily. Wish we could access the video and remote control the DVR from our Linux machines but the unit only supports Internet Explorer and ActiveX remote control. Other than that, the unit is fantastic and we are very happy.

Reviews.Title: Worth Asking Price..Excellent Quality with the Improved Cameras
Reviews.Author: J.P. "JP"
Reviews.Content: Thanks Amazon for the great deal!!I am very pleased with this outfit.I have been wanting a DVR security system, and this one is a steal at 299.00 shipped. I had DVR configured and working online in under an hour. Mounting the cameras is time consuming, but, worth the effort. I ordered camera extension cables and was sure glad I did.I look forward to the day I get a PTZ camera as this unit will control it. I had the system up less then a week when I had to kill an intruder. I have one camera pointed at my garden and I caught a woodchuck (ground hog) eating my big boy tomatoes!  Unfortunately my neighbor was not so lucky. The same woodchuck plowed thru her garden the day before, she was able to replant with peace of mind.Thanks to my SVAT CV502-4CH-002 Web Ready 4 Channel H.264 500GB HDD DVR Security System with Smart Phone Access and 4 Indoor/Outdoor Hi-Res Night Vision CCD Surveillance Cameras...........................I am the "Hero of the Neighborhood".  I would recommend this system to anyone.Thanks for reading my reviewJ.P.

Reviews.Title: Good system for the money.
Reviews.Author: Terri Mclain
Reviews.Content: Ordered two and set one up for my neighbor.  I caught a thief on camera only to find the night vision was not good enough to really identify the person. It was a young male.  Only thing I was able to make out.  I have identified people during the day with a great ease.For the price, its OK.  Wish there was better support for the product for questions.

Reviews.Title: Low price high quality
Reviews.Author: BAM
Reviews.Content: This is a good start up system.  The quality is good enough to keep people honest.  I use mine indoors so I cannot speak the outdore quality.  Super easy to set up and install.  Getting it set up to view over the internet takes some work but once done it has come in very handy.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this product
Reviews.Author: concerned buyer
Reviews.Content: First I want to say that I did not purchase this product, my wife did.  Second, calling this high resolution is a bit of a misnomer, the resolution is anything but high and you can barely make out any detail with this camera.  Third, the barrel connectors are weak and constantly lose signal showing nothing but wavy lines, you have to disconnect and reconnect the camera to make it work.  Third, out of the 8 cameras shipped 2 did not work at all.  4th the extension cables that amazon lists with this device (4pin DIN) are not the correct cables for this system and do not work with it! I would not recommend this product to anyone.  Please search harder for a better product.

Reviews.Title: Idiot Proof
Reviews.Author: R. Cooper
Reviews.Content: This is a great plug and play system. Of course the image quality could always be better but at this price it is probably standard. The setup was easy once I got a new Netgear wifi router with simple setup screens for connecting to the internet. I also set it to have a static ip address since otherwise you will lose the internet connection every time your power goes off. The iphone/ipad app you get separately from itunes works great too even over 3g without wifi access. Just be patient and follow their step by step instructions to the letter.

Reviews.Title: SVAT CV502 Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Razor "K.M."
Reviews.Content: I had always been interested in getting a camera to put at the front door so I wouldn't have go through a whole sales pitch or whatever. Seems about 90% of people that come over want to sell me something.  So anyway, I read some good reviews about this product and how clear the images are in the day or night. I find that this is mostly true. I mean you aren't going to be able to read the name badge on their shirt but you can certainly tell who it is.  The box that it came in was very sturdy and protected the cameras and DVR very nicely. The cameras especially seem to be of very good quality. One point to mention is that the screws that it comes with to mount the cameras are pretty flimsy. So if you have to move them (something I did)to adjust the angle and such they can easily break.  Set up was fairly easy I would say, and I am not a tech type. It doesn't come with a monitor so I used an old computer monitor and it worked great. I set the DVR and screen in the top shelf of a closet and ran all the cords up through the ceiling and out to the various points around the house that I wanted to set up the cameras. I plugged everything in and it worked perfectly.  The DVR has a one month record cycle and you can go back and check what was recorded just by putting in the day and time very easily.

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Cameras had great visual, enough cords and easy install. The software set up was a little sketchy. Had to have a friend set it all up. After that, all good.Would recommend for all households

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Cid
Reviews.Content: This product is great! It was real simple to install, the quality is phenominal. The pictures are crystal clear, this product will make a huge difference in the security of our business and also to monitor customer satisfaction, safety, and employee activity. Would definately recommend to others, Great Price!

Reviews.Title: Sees all, records all
Reviews.Author: Walter K Fritzler
Reviews.Content: Good overall picture quality, day or night. Takes some tinkering with the various features but adapts well to a wide variety of situations. Instructions are extensive but well written. Wiring installation can be quite simple or quite difficult, depending on a persons personnal choices as to how one wants the finished installation to look. It's do-it-yourself but does help to have some skills with a variety of tools.

Reviews.Title: svat cv502-4ch-002
Reviews.Author: ts
Reviews.Content: This camera system is pretty good for the money.Pictures come in a good picture and night vision works better than i thought.

Reviews.Title: Just purchased.
Reviews.Author: Paul L
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this system and I have not actually mounted the cameras yet but I did setup the dvr and tested the cameras.  The cameras do have good quality in my opinion and I was able to setup the dvr to view remotely.  I easiest way for me was to follow the port forwarding instructions to allow port forwarding on my actual router.  I followed the video provided that showed me how to do it and it worked great.  There is software included called net viewer that allows you to view the cameras, browse history, and do other things.  It's easier to use the net viewer software than to bother messing with internet explorer.  That also worked however but wants a 32 bit version of ie which can be a pain for some people.  I haven't used it too much at this point since I just bought it.  The only thing I noticed in my limited use was when I tried to fast forward through the few hours I had the cameras recording it was going slow.  I hit fast forward a few times so it was x4 but still was slow.  I think if you'd want to review the day quick you'd want to blow through the majority of the day when nothing is there.  Maybe you can do it but I was doing it wrong in my first attempt.  I will revise this posting after future use but currently I would buy this system.  It was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: SVAT indoor/outdoor DVR Security System
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: System was as it said-easy to set up- printed full manual from online download to have as a back up (lot of pages, killed my ink). I hooked up to a spare TV to set up all cameras and recording times. The hardest thing to do is run your wireing to each camera and keep it hidden or out of reach (my attic is getting smaller as I get older). I wanted the hard wire style because I don't want to worry about someone tapping in on a wireless system (I don't know if its possible but I want to be safe anyway). The cameras night vision is pretty good. The area is dark to the naked eye but on screen it is illuminated enough to make the persons face out (I set the recording to BEST)But one cameras nightvision was not working. I called the 1 800 number and told the rep. about it. She sent me a email with instructions to return the defective camera. You pay for the shipping and if they repair or replace the defective part they will pay for the return shipping(kind of a bummer). Dont throw away your receipt because you will need a copy of it to return any defective part. I've read the other reviews about calling in for customer service and can see why they say what they say but when I called the 1 800 number the recording said to leave a message. I didnt. I just dialed again. It said the same thing so I dialed again and the call was placed in waiting while this junk song played over and over. After about 8 minutes a real live person answered. She was very helpful and polite. She explained the procedure for returning a defective part and said that she would send me the email in approximatly 5 minutes. I waited for 1 hour and it did not arrive so I called again and went through the same re dialing game until a second real live person answered. I explained what had happened and she was very nice and said she would stay on line until I received the instructional return email. It uploaded in 30 seconds and I told her thank you. I have since mailed my defective camera according to instructions and am awaiting its repair or replacement. This is a good system and like anything, you can get a defective part. I hope the repair/replacement department is good. Customer service is also good but I think there phone system sucks. One last thing, the mounting bracket is poorly made so be careful and dont tighten it too much.  Aloha

Reviews.Title: Ok but does not work as fully described!
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: Has an ok picture. The wires are nice and discreet...The only CON to this system was that it said it would work on any internet connection to view it remotely..I have a CLEAR internet modem and it will not work with this type of internet. It took hours and hours of struggling to figure this out. so now i just have it recording one week at a time.

Reviews.Title: Good little beginner system.
Reviews.Author: kymedic
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my home to keep a eye on things. Took a couple of hours to completely set up and get working. The images are pretty good during the day and far better than I expected at night. No real complaints.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for buck
Reviews.Author: Edward Presnell
Reviews.Content: This system performs well for the price.  Good quality recording in full light.  Night vision quality is fair.  Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: tainguyen
Reviews.Content: everything are good,but this model you guys can not to put on the ceilling,can put on the wall only,if u put on the ceilling,the screen will be up side down

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: C. M. S. "MZ C"
Reviews.Content: This security system delivers everything it says it will.  I knew it only worked with 4 cameras when I purchased it, and now wish I could install more cameras; however, that not why I didn't give it a 5 star rating.  The playback is so horribly slow.  It takes forever to review troublesome time allotments.  Still, it scares most people away, and the night and day video is equally sharp, so if you live in an area when you only need to review it occasionally, I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great setup
Reviews.Author: Floyd
Reviews.Content: Awsome setup. Cameras are clear and have plenty of cable for instalation. Highley recomend this system and seller. Will definatly buy again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Grainy but good enough
Reviews.Author: A. Silvio "Mr Conehead"
Reviews.Content: I have two cameras inside front window watching our vehicles and street and one mounted outside watching backyard and alley way. Night vision is pretty much gone once cameras are mounted from in doors, but if mounted outside seem to work better. The infrared LED's reflect a lot of glare if mounted inside a window.  Software and "customer service" are NOT the best, but this is a very cheap system and does fit our immediate needs.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: coffeenut
Reviews.Content: Great Product and the best customer service ever! I was not sure how to get the view on my iphone. They were very nice and helpful. I was everyone would have support like them.

Reviews.Title: Great camera system
Reviews.Author: mat
Reviews.Content: This camera system did more than i thought it would. It has motion capture which makes it easy to see what happens through the night and day. night vision works pretty good where im at. The dvr system is easy to use and the price is great. You can have about a months worth of footage saved to it and its simple to back up to a computer.

Reviews.Title: nice buy
Reviews.Author: audley
Reviews.Content: hi everyone, i buy this system its my first and i am loving it, i know there is better systems out there but for the price its good i have not yet hook it up online because i need a router, but its worth the buy. peace

Reviews.Title: Complicated
Reviews.Author: Pat L. Brooks
Reviews.Content: We installed our system, very hard for a non-tekki.  I had to call with help to get it working, the lady was very patient and helpful and we had it working fine, used it when we went somewhere, and I could watch every room on my iPhone.  We then put the wiring up in the attic permanently, and have had nothing but problems getting it working again.  We now can view our rooms with everything BUT my iPhone, which is the main one we wanted to use to watch the house while we're away.  I called again for help, this time the lady just didn't seem to understand that all I wanted to know was how to get it working with my iPhone again.  She had an accent and was very hard to understand.  She had me do several things that just confused me more.  I was almost in tears so told her to "never mind".  At this point, I still cannot view the house with my iPhone.  The manual uses such complicated terminology, and for people who who don't understand that stuff, it made no sense.  I don't know who to get to help me with this, but guess I'll have to try to find someone....Geek Squad from Best Buy, maybe, just hate to pay a bunch of money for the help.

Reviews.Title: Just Want To Let You Know I Have A Problem
Reviews.Author: Barbara V. Bandy
Reviews.Content: I bought this security camera set in July of 2011. I bought it because i had vehicle vandalism, And now with new tenants in Basement Apt and shady people (traffic) coming around i was happy to get this. Tho the people see the camera's they wear hoody's now. We all know what this means but my landloard he does not seemed concerned much. Any ways back to the review folks sorry. I placed 3 of the camera's outside of my second floor windows. During the day i get a real nice clear picture. At night i get a picture on my HD TY it comes in a bit fuzzy, But i am able to see my car and people come and go. It was very easy to hook this unit up starting with the DVR and Camera's. Then i downloaded the cd that came with it and followed the directions and had it hooked up to my internet and computer in minutes. Everything is easy to use on the menu just follow the directions and it is all easy going. To be honest i thought the video's would have been better seeing that first review but if i lived on the first floor this would be the best system in the world for the price!!! Lets put it this way if it was day time and i knew the person coming i would have no problem identifing them if it is a stranger and they look at my camera i can see them but wouldn't be able to Id the face for 100% sure if a crime was comitted but the clothing would do the trick! The neibor on the first floor is a nervous lady and said i could run a camera down to her window so that will be the bomb Face Shots!! So if you live on the second floor depending on what you need it for it maybe good for you as it would of been for me but my circumstances have changed and i need a closer shot exspecially at night time. I think they may have other camera's compatable i could buy that would help me at night and get a closer shot. I am going to look into that after my problem gets fixed...***PROBLEM***BOUGHT THIS UNIT IN JULY HERE BRAND NEW FROM AMAZON TONIGHT I POWERED SYSTEM DOWN AND UNPLUGGED IT SO I COULD PLUG MY INTERNET CABLE IN. WHEN I TURNED SYSTEM BACK ON I HAVE NO HARD DRIVE! MY 500GB DRIVE DIED TODAY JUST ABOUT 4 MONTHS INTO MY WARRANTY. I CAN STILL USE THE UNIT AND SEE ON MY TV AND LAPTOP BUT I CAN NOT RECORD ANYTHING!! I NOTIFIED SVAT VIA ONLINE FORM OF SITUATION NOW IT IS TIME TO SEE HOW THERE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS AND IF THEY WILL STAND BY THERE WARRANTY. I WILL UPDATE YOU ON THE PROGRESS OF THIS SITUATION AS IT MOVES ALONG.SORRY FOR THE CAPITALS BUT SOME FOLKS MAY WANT TO SEE THE PROBLEM WITHOUT THE STORY ABOVE BUT THAT STORY WAS MY REVIEW AS WELL AND HOPE IT HELPS SOME CUSTOMERS LOOKING TO BUY AND LIVE ON A SECOND FLOOR APARTMENT.. THANKYOU FOR READING MY REVIEW AND I WILL KEEP YOU UPDATED!!!!***OFF TOPIC****If anyone has any suggestions for me on how to better my security system like a better camera that would deff fit my system or any other ideas please let me know. I'm worried about this warranty and hope they are a good company. I just took a $500 hit from Acer on a laptop i got from a retail store. I sent it to acer twice and paid for shipping there. Both times it was the motherboard and within 4 months apart. Now 7 months down the road same problem i call acer's 800# and put in my serial # and they say it is out of warranty and phone hangs up after a short announcment saying go to there web and pay for questions and some other garbage. Just have bad luck with electronics! Even the drive from my xboxS 250GB died but microsoft paid shipping and fixed praise the loard. good luck and happy holidays everyone!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
